label: graft-versus-host disease, susceptibility to
definition: An inherited susceptibility or predisposition to developing graft vs. host disease.

label: heterotaxy, visceral, 5, autosomal
definition: Any visceral hetetotaxy in which the cause of the disease is a mutation in the NODAL gene.

label: sarcoma, non-human animal
definition: Sarcoma that occurs in non-human animals.

label: melanoma, non-human animal
definition: Melanoma that occurs in non-human animals.

label: adenoma, non-human
definition: Adenoma that occurs in non-human animals.

label: bovine neoplasm
definition: A neoplasm that occurs in cattle.

label: bovine leukemia
definition: A malignant (clonal) hematologic disorder, involving hematopoietic stem cells and characterized by the presence of primitive or atypical myeloid or lymphoid cells in the bone marrow and the blood which occurs in cattle

label: bovine protoporphyria
definition: A congenital metabolic disorder characterized by a deficiency in the enzyme ferrochelatase, which occurs in cattle.

label: bovine lymphosarcoma
definition: Lymphosarcoma that occurs in a cow.

label: bovine rectal myxoma
definition: A myxoma that occurs in the rectum of a cow.

label: canine neoplasm
definition: A neoplasm that occurs in dogs.

label: canine osteosarcoma
definition: An osteosarcoma of mesenchymal origin in a dog. It is the most common bone cancer in dogs, most often developing in the limbs of large or giant breed dogs. The morphologic and biologic behavior of canine osteosarcomas is similar to that of human osteosarcomas.

label: canine melanoma
definition: Melanoma occurring in a dog. It is the most common malignant tumor found in the mouths of dogs and also occurs frequently on the digits. All canine melanomas are locally invasive and malignant canine melanomas show a high rate of metastasis. Melanoma in dogs has been established as a relevant model for human melanoma.

label: canine hemangiosarcoma
definition: Hemangiosarcoma occurring in a dog. It is an incurable tumor of vascular endothelial cells and occurs more commonly in dogs beyond middle age, and is especially common in certain breeds. Most hemangiosarcomas do not have a known cause.

label: canine mammary carcinoma
definition: Mammary carcinoma occurring in a dog.

label: canine leukemia
definition: An acute or chronic malignant (clonal) hematologic disorder, arising from hematopoietic stem cells in dogs. It is characterized by the presence of primitive or atypical myeloid or lymphoid cells in the bone marrow and the blood.

label: canine lymphoma
definition: A malignant lymphoproliferative disorder that affects dogs. It is characterized by the clonal proliferation of B- or T-lymphocytes in the lymph nodes, bone marrow, and/or extranodal sites.

label: canine prostate carcinoma
definition: A malignant epithelial neoplasm arising from the prostate gland of a dog.

label: canine histiocytic sarcoma
definition: A malignant neoplasm that affects dogs, characterized by the presence of malignant cells with morphologic and immunophenotypic characteristics similar to those seen in mature histiocytes.

label: canine transitional cell carcinoma
definition: A malignant neoplasm that affects dogs, arising from transitional epithelium.

label: canine sarcoma
definition: A malignant mesenchymal neoplasm that affects dogs. It arises from muscle, fat, fibrous tissue, bone, cartilage, and blood vessels.

label: canine mastocytoma
definition: A tumor composed of mast cells that occurs in dogs.

label: canine glioma
definition: A brain or spinal cord tumor arising from glial cells that occurs in dogs.

label: canine hepatocellular carcinoma
definition: A malignant tumor arising from hepatocytes that occurs in dogs.

label: canine lung adenocarcinoma
definition: A carcinoma that arises from the lung in dogs and is characterized by the presence of malignant glandular epithelial cells.

label: canine rhabdomyosarcoma
definition: A malignant mesenchymal neoplasm arising from skeletal muscle that occurs in dogs.

label: canine thyroid adenocarcinoma
definition: Adeonocarcinoma of the thyroid gland occurring in a dog.

label: canine soft tissue sarcoma
definition: Soft tissue sarcoma occurring in a dog.

label: canine oral squamous cell carcinoma
definition: Oral squamous cell carcinoma that occurs in a dog.

label: canine pancreatic carcinoma
definition: Pancreatic carcinoma that occurs in a dog.

label: canine acanthomatous epulis
definition: A tumor arising from odontogenic epithelium and occurs in a dog.

label: canine mammary adenoma
definition: An adenoma arising from the mammary gland of a dog.

label: canine gastrointestinal stromal tumor
definition: A gastrointestinal stromal tumor occurring in a dog.

label: canine granular cell tumor
definition: A granular cell tumor occurring in a dog.

label: canine Langerhans cell histiocytosis
definition: Langerhans cell histiocytosis occurring in a dog.

label: canine nephroblastoma
definition: A nephroblastoma occurring in a dog.

label: canine thyroid gland medullary carcinoma
definition: Thyroid gland medullary carcinoma occurring in a dog.

label: canine transmissible venereal tumor
definition: A sexually transmitted tumor arising from histiocytes and occurring in dogs.

label: canine sebaceous gland epithelioma
definition: Sebaceous epithelioma occurring in a dog.

label: canine oral melanoma
definition: A melanoma that affects the lip and/or oral cavity of a dog.

label: canine cutaneous t-cell lymphoma
definition: Cutaneous T-cell lymphoma occurring in a dog.

label: equine neoplasm
definition: Neoplasm that occurs in a horse.

label: horse melanoma
definition: Melanoma that occurs in a horse.

label: horse lymphoma
definition: Lymphoma that occurs in a horse.

label: horse sarcoid
definition: A fibroblastic tumor that occurs in the skin of a horse.

label: horse transitional cell carcinoma
definition: Transitional cell carcinoma that occurs in a horse.

label: feline neoplasm
definition: Neoplasm that occurs in a cat.

label: feline lymphoma
definition: A lymphoma that occurs in cats. It is associated with exposure to feline leukemia virus and feline immunodeficiency virus.

label: feline mammary carcinoma
definition: Mammary carcinoma occurring in a cat.

label: feline oral squamous cell carcinoma
definition: Oral squamous cell carcinoma that occurs in a cat.

label: feline osteosarcoma
definition: Osteosarcoma that occurs in a cat.

label: feline bronchioloalveolar lung carcinoma
definition: Bronchioloalveolar lung carcinoma that occurs in a cat.

label: feline fibrosarcoma
definition: Fibrosarcoma that occurs in a cat.

label: feline erythroleukemia
definition: Erythroleukemia that occurs in a cat.

label: feline reticulum cell sarcoma
definition: Reticulum cell sarcoma that occurs in a cat.

label: feline large granular lymphocyte lymphoma
definition: A T-cell leukemia in which there is a persistent increase in the number of large granular lymphocytes in the peripheral blood and occurring in a cat.

label: feline melanoma
definition: A malignant, usually aggressive tumor composed of atypical, neoplastic melanocytes that occurs in a cat.

label: feline histiocytic sarcoma
definition: Histiocytic sarcoma occurring in a cat.

label: feline progressive histiocytosis
definition: A condition occurring in cats characterized by solitary or multiple cutaneous nodules and papules, which may metastasize late in the course of the disease. Lesions consist of poorly circumscribed histiocytic infiltrates of the superficial and deep dermis, with variable extension into the subcutis.

label: feline synovial cell sarcoma
definition: Synovial cell sarcoma occurring in a cat.

label: chicken neoplasm
definition: A neoplasm that occurs in a chicken.

label: chicken bursal lymphoma
definition: A malignant lymphoma that arises in the bursa of Fabricius in a chicken.

label: chicken fibrosarcoma
definition: Fibrosarcoma that occurs in a chicken.

label: chicken hepatoma
definition: Hepatoma that occurs in a chicken.

label: chicken monocytic leukemia
definition: Monocytic leukemia that occurs in a chicken.

label: chicken lymphoma
definition: Lymphoma that occurs in a chicken.

label: rous sarcoma
definition: A fibrosarcoma, originally observed in a Plymouth Rock hen, now thought to be an expression of infection by certain viruses of the avian leukosis-sarcoma complex in the family

label: fish melanoma
definition: Melanoma that occurs in a fish.

label: porcine leukemia
definition: Leukemia that occurs in a pig.

label: porcine lymphoma
definition: Lymphoma that occurs in a pig.

label: sheep lung adenocarcinoma
definition: Adenocarcinoma arising from the lung of a sheep.
